# Distribution of relative lens-source proper motion in the fast model 
# of the self-lensing of the Small Magellanic Cloud (Mroz & Poleski 2018, 
# AJ 155, 154)
# http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2018AJ....155..154M
# The total event rate is 2.19e-7 yr^{-1} assuming the total mass 
# of the SMC of 10^9 M_solar.
#Byte-to-byte description of file:
#------------------------------------------------------------------------
#   Bytes Format Label    Explanations
#------------------------------------------------------------------------
#   1-  5 F5.3   mu_rel   Relative lens-source proper motion (mas/yr)
#   7- 14 F7.5   Gamma    Differential event rate dGamma / dmu_rel 
#                         (10^{-7} per year per mas)
#------------------------------------------------------------------------
